A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: there are only two valid criticisms of this movie. only one of them has to do with the movie itself. the other one is really a collection of criticisms that can be made about the trilogy this movie is part of. both these criticisms are valid and deserve explanations or follow up in IX.\n\nother than that? this movie was phenomenal. 100%. no reservation. the best star wars movie\, period.
